Label: Investigation Identifier
Description: A identifier or an accession number provided by a repository. This SHOULD be locally unique.

Label: Investigation Title
Description: A concise name given to the investigation.

Label: Investigation Description
Description: A textual description of the investigation.

Label: Investigation Submission Date
Datatype: String formatted as ISO8601 date YYYY-MM-DD
Description: The date on which the investigation was reported to the repository.

Label: Investigation Public Release Date
Datatype: String formatted as ISO8601 date YYYY-MM-DD
Description: The date on which the investigation was released publicly.
